welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zhukovskiy, Russia! Known as the center of Russian aviation, this charming city offers a unique blend of history and innovation. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Zhukovskiy has to offer.

restaurants.name: Monsolei
restaurants.description: Monsolei is a gastropub located in Жуковский.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zhukovsky International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zhukovsky International Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'ZIA Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Domodedovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Domodedovo Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Domodedovo Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chkalovsky Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to handling cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
